trans-unit.source: Represents a column of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料行<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewComboBoxColumn class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> used to logically host cells that enable users to select values from a list of choices.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewComboBoxColumn 類別是特殊的類型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>用於邏輯主應用程式的資料格，讓使用者從選項清單中選取值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewComboBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewComboBoxColumn 具有相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>中每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>的交集它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the cells manually by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以手動填入儲存格，藉由設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the column to the data source indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，將資料行繫結至資料來源所指示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a database table, set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of a column in the table.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是繫結至資料庫資料表，請將資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>屬性資料表中的資料行的名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a collection of objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of an object property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是繫結至物件的集合，請將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>物件屬性名稱的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the column drop-down list manually by adding values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以手動填入資料行的下拉式清單，藉由加入至值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the drop-down list to its own data source by setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以繫結下拉式清單至它自己的資料來源將資料行設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the values are objects in a collection or records in a database table, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為集合中的物件或資料庫資料表中的記錄時，您也必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column provides the values that are displayed in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>屬性會指出哪個物件屬性或資料庫資料行提供下拉式清單中顯示的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column is used to set the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>屬性會指出哪一個物件的屬性或資料庫資料行用來設定的儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: One typical scenario is to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to a parent database table and bind the drop-down list to a related child table.
trans-unit.target: 一個典型的案例是將繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項加入父資料庫資料表，並繫結相關的子系資料表下拉式清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an `Orders` table that contains a `ProductID` column and set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property to a `Products` table that contains `ProductID` and `ProductName` columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制權傳輸至`Orders`資料表，其中包含`ProductID`資料行和資料行集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>屬性`Products`資料表，其中包含`ProductID`和`ProductName`資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you would set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to "ProductID" to populate its cell values from the `Orders.ProductID` column.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您可以將資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>屬性，以 「 ProductID 」 擴展其儲存格的值從`Orders.ProductID`資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, to display the actual product names in the cells and the drop-down list, you would map these values to the `Products` table by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property to "ProductID" and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property to "ProductName".
trans-unit.target: 不過，若要顯示實際的產品名稱的資料格和下拉式清單中，您可以對應至這些值`Products`藉由設定資料表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>「 ProductID 」 的屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>"ProductName"的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The drop-down list values (or the values indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property) must include the actual cell values or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式清單值 (或值所指示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>屬性) 必須包含實際的資料格的值或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項將會擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties automatically sets the corresponding properties of all cells in the column including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 設定資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>屬性會自動設定所有的資料格，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>資料行中的對應屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>和</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override these property values for specific cells, set the column property first, and then set the cell properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫特定資料格的這些屬性值，設定資料行屬性第一次，然後再設定的資料格屬性。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> does not have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>沒有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，從下拉式清單中選取值，設定儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"></xref>類別的預設狀態。

trans-unit.source: When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> instance.
trans-unit.target: 當初始化新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>執行個體，這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性至新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in the column will match the characters being entered in the cell with one from the possible selections.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料行中的資料格是否會符合資料格中輸入與其中一個可能的選取範圍的字元。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>資料行中每個資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if auto completion is activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟動時自動完成。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來建立儲存格的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>類別初始化至新建立的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>這個屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>的建構函式

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 重新產生資料行後，才明顯這些變更 (例如，則資料行排序或透過呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> ，後建立模型資料行中的所有資料格。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性的值不是類型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個資料行的完全相同複本。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: 若要複製的資料格的資料行使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示複製<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可填入下拉式方塊選擇的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The DataSource or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> properties specify where to retrieve the selection data shown in the combo box drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>屬性指定要擷取顯示下拉式方塊的下拉式清單中的選取項目資料的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the DataSource property, if the data must be drawn from a nondefault property or column, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property must be set to the name of the nondefault property or column.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 [資料來源] 屬性中，如果必須繪製資料，從非預設屬性或資料行，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>屬性必須設定為非預設屬性或資料行的名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSource property is set to a string array, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源屬性設定為字串陣列，然後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>不需要設定，因為陣列中的每個字串將可用值和顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定要從中擷取字串來顯示在下拉式方塊中的資料行的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The data for the values stored in a column of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> objects is obtained from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預存<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>物件取自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>的資料行中值的資料

trans-unit.source: If this data comes from a nondefault property or column, then the DisplayMember property must be set to the necessary property name or column name.
trans-unit.target: 如果此資料來自於非預設屬性或資料行，則 DisplayMember 屬性必須設為所需的屬性名稱或資料行名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the cell values are internal values not visible to the user, then use DisplayMember and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> to map the internal cell values to user-viewable values.
trans-unit.target: 如果看不到使用者的內部值的資料格值，然後使用 DisplayMember 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>來將內部的資料格的值對應到使用者可檢視的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the DisplayMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>屬性設為字串陣列，DisplayMember 屬性不需要設定，因為將使用陣列中的每個字串，作為有效的顯示字串，以及有效的基礎值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>中指定的資料來源中指定的屬性或資料行名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值可判斷不能編輯時，如何顯示下拉式方塊。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayStyle property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: DisplayStyle 屬性會影響資料行中的儲存格的外觀時，它們不是處於編輯模式，不論它們是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格處於編輯模式，它一律會看起來像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property value is `false`, the DisplayStyle property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the DisplayStyle property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>屬性值是`false`，DisplayStyle 屬性會影響資料行中的所有儲存格; 否則 DisplayStyle 屬性會影響目前儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow in the cells is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 行為和外觀的儲存格的下拉式箭號會以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the DisplayStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用滑鼠指標在儲存格上方時，反白顯示資料格，您必須設定 DisplayStyle 屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>屬性至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref> value indicating the combo box appearance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref>值，指出下拉式方塊的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*> property value applies only to the current cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control when the current cell is in this column.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>屬性值僅適用於中的目前儲存格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制此資料行中的目前儲存格時。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>

trans-unit.source: If the DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly property value is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly 屬性值為`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>屬性會影響所有資料格資料行，否則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>屬性會影響目前儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>屬性會影響資料行中的儲存格的外觀時，它們不是處於編輯模式，不論它們是否為唯讀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格處於編輯模式，它一律會看起來像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the display style applies only to the current cell; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>顯示樣式只適用於目前的儲存格。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the drop-down lists of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在下拉式方塊的下拉式清單的寬度方塊。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會對應至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>成員。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>資料行中每個資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the drop-down lists.
trans-unit.target: 寬度 （像素為單位的下拉式清單）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行的儲存格的平面樣式外觀。

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property affects the behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrows for the cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: FlatStyle 屬性會影響的行為和外觀的下拉式箭號，針對這個資料行中的資料格。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], when the FlatStyle property is set to `Flat` or `Popup` the drop-down arrows are resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the FlatStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)]，當 FlatStyle 屬性設定為`Flat`或`Popup`下拉箭號會調整的大小根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```若要啟用滑鼠指標在儲存格上方時，反白顯示資料格，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>，並為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> FlatStyle 屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the cell appearance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>值，指出資料格的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of objects used as selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 取得當做下拉式方塊中選取項目使用的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Items or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> properties are used to populate the selections of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 項目或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性用來填入下拉式方塊的選取項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If strings are added to Items, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> properties do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: 如果將字串新增至項目，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>屬性不需要設定，因為每個加入的字串將可用值和顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>不支援使用多個具有相同的顯示值的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set, then Items cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>屬性設定，則無法使用項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection> that represents the selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>表示下拉式方塊中的選取項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the drop-down list of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行中的資料格的下拉式清單中的項目數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>資料行中每個資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of drop-down list items, from 1 to 100.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式清單項目，從 1 到 100 的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default is 8.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 8。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the combo box are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否排序下拉式方塊中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>資料行中每個資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果下拉式方塊已排序。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述資料行的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述資料行。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to get values that correspond to the selections in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定要從中取得下拉式清單中選取對應值的資料行的屬性。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> for more information about its relationship with ValueMember.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>如需有關使用 ValueMember 其關聯性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the ValueMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>屬性設為字串陣列，ValueMember 屬性不需要設定，因為將使用陣列中的每個字串，作為有效的顯示字串，以及有效的基礎值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定屬性的名稱或資料行用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
